column1: Little Goat Diner////Both the staff in little goat bakery and restaurant are very nice and willing to give advice. As to food
column2: I tried their scone and conchas
column3: they are good but not outstanding. I also tried the brunch in their restaurant. I ordered BRANDADE AND BELLY
column4: though the combination of these ingredients are pretty weird to me
column5: I found it taste good actually. I love the creamy biscuits especially.
